nodes.text: Sordaan's Rodian Hunter Outpost, also called Sordaan's Space Station, was a space station established by the Rodian hunter Sordaan Xris in the Kashyyyk system at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Xris purchased a writ of protection from the Empire in exchange for this area of space. Freelance Rodian pilots were hired to protect the base and Xris' business partners during the Rodians' hunting operations on Kashyyyk. The base's security was overseen by Xris' security chief.
